name: Mushroom Forest
description:
Help Sylvie the shapeshifting witch collect ingredients for her potions in this one level short 2D platformer. Transform into a bird to fly up and reach ingredients high in the treetops, or into a ferret to furrow around in the roots.

Created over the span of four months by Mikayla Stock.

Controls:

W - Forward

A - Left

D - Right

S - Turn into a ferret

Ctrl - Turn into a bird

Space - Jump
